subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Troy Murphy’s most important assist will not show up in the box score. Indiana’s Murphy and Chicago’s Tyrus Thomas were ejected from Wednesday’s game after an altercation. Indiana used it as motivation in a 117-102 win over the visiting Bulls.
